document.full_text: supervalu inc , the third-biggest u.s. supermarket chain by sales, said on thursday that more effective promotions fueled quarterly profit that topped its own expectation, and shares surged 13 percent.
document.title: supervalu profit beats, shares surge
lines_and_colors: supervalu inc , the third-biggest u.s. supermarket chain by sales, said on thursday that more effective promotions fueled quarterly profit that topped its own expectation, and shares surged 13 percent.
